about.title: About Public Salary ForPublic.id
about.subtitle: Promoting transparency in Indonesian public sector and wage compensation

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content1: Public Salary ForPublic.id is dedicated to promoting transparency and accountability in Indonesian public sector compensation. We provide comprehensive, accurate, and accessible information about salaries, wages, and compensation across various sectors to foster better public understanding and oversight.
mission.content2: As part of the ForPublic.id ecosystem, we believe that transparency in public finance is essential for building trust between government and citizens, enabling informed public discourse, and supporting evidence-based policy making.

dataSources.title: Data Sources & Methodology
dataSources.subtitle: All data is sourced from official government regulations and public documents

legal.title: Legal Compliance
legal.content: This platform operates in full compliance with Indonesian public information transparency laws, including:
legal.law1: UU No. 14/2008 - Public Information Openness Law
legal.law2: Government Transparency Principles - Right to public information access
legal.law3: Data Protection Standards - Responsible data handling and privacy protection
legal.disclaimer: All salary information presented is already public by law and sourced from official government publications. No private or confidential information is collected or displayed.

contact.title: Contact & Feedback
contact.content: We welcome feedback, suggestions, and reports of data inaccuracies. Help us improve transparency in Indonesian public service.
